sentences.english: The band started to play a 38)twangy tune.
sentences.chinese: 乐队开始弹奏一首拨弦乐。

sentences.english: The band played the guests in.
According to Polson, bands' music changes when they go mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 波尔森表示，乐队在走向主流后，音乐发生了变化。

sentences.english: When the band only played for 15 minutes, the fans felt they had been shortchanged.
sentences.chinese: 乐队只演奏了15分钟，粉丝们觉得自己受骗了。

sentences.english: He invited me to play it with the band.
sentences.chinese: 他邀请我吹奏萨克斯管，和乐队合作。

sentences.english: His firm was named in homage to the Beatles' record label, Apple.
sentences.chinese: 他的公司命名苹果以向披头士乐队的唱片致敬。

sentences.english: Together with three friends, he founded a group called the Labor Exchange Band.
sentences.chinese: 他与3个朋友一起创立了“交工乐队”。

sentences.english: "Take That" are the best group in the whole world. So there.
sentences.chinese: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

sentences.english: Whether it's over the hill time or just for fun this birthday ensemble is sure to please.
sentences.chinese: 不管是在山上还是玩票这个时候肯定请乐队生日。

sentences.english: The orchestra will give two more performances before leaving Britain.
sentences.chinese: 离开英国之前，这个管弦乐队将加演两场。

sentences.english: Well, don’t be too narrow-minded. There are lots of good bands out there.
sentences.chinese: 哎，别那么眼光狭窄嘛，有很多非常不错的乐队呢。

sentences.english: The welcome ceremony appears extremely busy, has the orchestra to play music, the firecrackers fireworks sound together.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎仪式显得热闹非凡，有乐队奏乐，鞭炮礼花齐鸣。

sentences.english: Well go to a concert tomorrow evening to hear the symphony orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 明天晚上我们去参加音乐会，听交响乐队的演奏。

sentences.english: In Episode I, Bith extras made up a Podrace arena band.
sentences.chinese: 在首部曲里，比思人演员组成了一个飞梭赛场乐队。

sentences.english: Jack drums for the school band.
I got this Beatles CD in the second-hand shop for a pound.
sentences.chinese: 这张甲壳虫乐队的CD在二手店才卖一英镑。
